title: Live in at the Hollywood Bowl
description: Legendary band leader captures the feel of his "uptown" sophisticated sound on this live concert recording, feat. bassist Oscar Pettiford, vocalist/trumpeter/violinist Ray Nance, vocalist Kay Davis, as well as Johnny Hodges, Sonny Greer, Shorty Baker & many others. (Previously deleted:3/1/04 Original release date:10/24/00)
